title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Competencies: Intentional Practice-Based Training for Evidence-Based Medicine (EBM) Application

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational medical theory and research methodology comprehension
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply evidence-based medicine principles through clinical scenario analysis
Learners enhance problem-solving skills related to EBM (Evidence-Based Medicine) through deliberate practice methods
Learners can improve EBM attitudes and practical behaviors by reflecting on feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
